dimensions.label: Sarcasm Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin react to sarcastic remarks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take sarcasm personally and may become defensive.
Your FarTwin will use sarcasm as a go-to response to humorously deflect criticism.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logical reasoning to break down complex problems.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids and hands-on experiences.
Your FarTwin will learn by listening to audio materials and discussions.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions to those around them.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions hidden and only reveal them in close relationships.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront the opposing party directly and assertively.
Your FarTwin will try to find a mutually beneficial solution through compromise and negotiation.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is naturally skilled at using technology and enjoys exploring new tools.
Your FarTwin finds it difficult to adapt to new technologies and prefers more traditional methods.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view the world?

options.description: Your FarTwin has a broad, global perspective and is open to diverse cultures.
Your FarTwin tends to focus on local issues and communities.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin is naturally competitive and may struggle with collaboration.
Your FarTwin enjoys working together with others towards common goals.
